views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10.

NoSpot10 gives you the options to Hide the Entire Field of Search Bar and Disable the Gestures of the Spotlight on iOS 10.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Version 1.1 - Added the option to Hide the Edit Button from the Spotlight Footers Items. - Added the option to Hide the Edit Button Text from the Spotlight Footers Items. - Added the option to Custom Change the Edit Button Text on the Spotlight Today View. Happy holidays :-) Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to Custom Change the Search Bar Header Text on Spotlight.
Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to Always Show More for Spotlight (tip by prouser).
- Added Twitter, My Repo and Donations Icons Labels.
Version 1.0.7
- Added the option to Disable Spotlight Cancel Button.
- Added the option to Clear Spotlight Background Cells.
- Dark Mode: added options to make Dark Spotlight Text Cells, Search Bar and Background Cells.
- Now you can add My Repo on Cydia and Donate Me (thanks so much) with the New Labels in Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Labels Descriptions in Prefs.
Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Clear the Spotlight Suggestions (thanks prouser for the tip).
Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Hide the Spotlight/Today View on HomeScreen.


Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Hide the Spotlight/Today View Footer Items (thanks sinfool by Flex for the tip about this Update).
Version 0.0.1-3
- Added the option to Disable the Spotlight on HomeScreen Swipe Right Gesture (also for iOS 9).


Version 0.0.1-2
- Added the option to Clear Spotlight Search when dismissing (also for iOS 9).
